price: ''Yarın onu bizimle beraber gönder de gezip oynasın. Biz onu mutlaka koruruz.''
arabic: أَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعَنَا غَدٗا يَرۡتَعۡ وَيَلۡعَبۡ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: arsil'hu maʿanā ghadan yartaʿ wayalʿab wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
